name: The Slime is Coming
description:
This is the GoatBoat entry for the metroidvania game jam.

Play as a slime exploring the remnants of a disaster!

Download V2.0 for the most recent bug fixed version.

Have fun!

Lead Designer: Topper
Lead Programmer: Dev
Lead Artist: Maakole
Musician: Whelp
Background Art: PeaceMaker
